verbose_text: Intriguingly, PDGF induced chemotaxis was strongly suppressed by the treatment of either purified recombinant alpha-Syn or alpha-Syn (A53T) (XREF_FIG) in a dose dependent manner, with the inhibition by alpha-Syn (A53T) being three times stronger than that by the wild type (XREF_FIG).
evidence: PDGF-induced chemotaxis was strongly suppressed by the treatment of either purified recombinant alpha-Syn
